entry.title: Code test
entry.content:
Bear claw cookie jelly-o fruitcake ice cream jelly beans. I love lollipop jujubes chocolate biscuit. Icing danish soufflé powder icing. Jelly beans ice cream jelly sesame snaps tootsie roll brownie wypas bear claw. Toffee tiramisu jelly beans. Macaroon lollipop tart. Applicake danish brownie oat cake ice cream marzipan marzipan caramels I love. Gummies ice cream tart chocolate bar jujubes candy canes sugar plum croissant.

This is pretty cool, isn’t it? Let’s see how far we can go with this code sharing.

Another code sample

So we had this code sample above. How about some JavaScript?

The gist of it all

It seems like octopress can easily insert gists from GitHub. So let’s try this:
